    Method
    Description
    RulesBuilder
    RulesBuilder.allowAll()
    Allow access to all packages, superseding all previous rules.
    RulesBuilder
    RulesBuilder.applyRules(RulesApplier applier)
    Applies a set of rules to this builder.
    RulesBuilder
    RulesBuilder.denyAll()
    Deny access to all packages, superseding all previous rules.
    RulesBuilder
    RulesBuilder.ModuleScope.end()
    End the current rules for this module and return to the outermost scope.
    RulesBuilder
    RulesBuilder.validate(ModuleLayer layer)
    Validates that all classes are loadable, and that all class members are found.
